0011100011010101 1011111101000101 1 -> sum: 1111100000011011, cout: 0
0100111001101000 0011000010000110 1 -> sum: 0111111011101111, cout: 0
1111000100111101 1011000101011100 0 -> sum: 1010001010011001, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
